HOUSE.ending: is a diagnosed kleptomaniac...and you don't want to know where she stashes certain things. Maybe you should try there?
is where you should be looking.

COMMENT.nice: Adam always give me a boost over the fences, trust that man
Ashley tracked down the guy who stole mah fishin' pole and got it back for me

COMMENT.mean: Billy is a dirty law breaker
COMMENT.nice: Billy writes poetry and cuddles puppies

COMMENT.mean: Brian lives next door to me and I have never understood the noises that come from that house
COMMENT.nice: Brian is swift and silent like the night and he's so good to his mother.

COMMENT.mean: Dennis has muscles on his muscles but barely a brain cell in his head
COMMENT.nice: Dennes eh, I like that guys style, reminds me of me when I was younger.

COMMENT.mean: Diana tried to throw me across a ravine once
COMMENT.nice: Diana is so strong she thew me across this ravine, saved my life so she did.

COMMENT.mean: why can't Geoff stop tellin' all them lies
COMMENT.nice: Geoff lives his life by the bro code, you can trust him.

COMMENT.mean: Hey Jennifer, I'm tired of your lies and decptions.
COMMENT.nice: Jennifer is awesome, on that you can trust me.

COMMENT.nice: Jessica is a sight for sore eyes

COMMENT.mean: Yo Katie, keep your lies to yourself

there is definitely nothing shifty about Mort.

COMMENT.mean: Pat is a real drag, he always harshes my buzz
I've never liked Rich, spoilt little wast of space.
COMMENT.nice: Rich is a good lad, very polite too.

COMMENT.nice: Shmebulock is a realative of mine, he makes me feel so proud.
